title: Remember Clubhouse? Social audio app hopes icebreaker games will jog your memory
content:
Clubhouse is testing a new in-room gaming feature for iOS and Android. Reported by TechCrunch, the app is releasing a game called “Wild Cards,” in which a series of questions are presented in order for people to get to know each other better. 

more…

The post Remember Clubhouse? Social audio app hopes icebreaker games will jog your memory appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Clubhouse is testing a gaming feature called "Wild Cards," a game that presents a series of questions to help people get to know each other.
